text.name: Tears of the Tarnished Blood - Inception [始]
text.desc:
[CantDuel]
Ignores the target's Defense Skill
This Skill does not hit an enemy
[EndSkill] Gain [DragonLance]
coinDescs:
This unit takes fixed damage by this Skill's Final Power
- This damage does not Stagger or reduce this unit's HP below 1

passiveList.name: Crying Tears
passiveList.desc:
If the target is defeated after this unit's Attack or Counter Skills:
- Gain 2 [Agility] next turn (once per turn)
- To all allies, including this unit: next turn, apply 1 DMG Up to the Damage Type & Affinity of the Skill used to activate this effect (once per turn)
- Inflict 1 [Reduction] to all enemies next turn (once per turn)

When this unit dies:
- Apply 1 [ShamrockDamageUp] and [PenetrateDamageUp] to all allies next turn (once per turn)
- Inflict 1 [Reduction] to all enemies next turn (once per turn)

text.name: Tears of the Tarnished Blood - Inception [始]
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets Randomly
[BeforeAttack] At 4+ highest Reson., Atk Weight +1
[BeforeAttack] -2 Base Power for every Cracked Coin (max -8)
[EndSkill] Gain [DragonLance]
